properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 1:06PM CST until February 27 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Mississippi River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Mississippi River at Helena
* from Monday February 24 until Wednesday February 26.
* At 12 PM Thursday the stage was...36.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 44.0 feet on Monday February 24.
* Flood stage is 44.0 feet.
* At 44.0 feet...In Arkansas, road to landing east of downtown Helena
is flooded. In Mississippi, cabin areas east of Desoto Lake are
flooding. Industries north of Friars Point, Mississippi are
flooding.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Friday morning or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
